resources.string: 1. Choose the correct option related to Android. Correct answer - B) Android is an Operating System
2. What is an activity in android? Correct answer - C) A activity is a single screen in an application.
3. The full form of ADB is. Correct answer - B) Android Debug Bridge
4. Among the following options choose the one for which Android is based on Linux. Correct answer - D) All of the above are reasons for which Android is based on Linux.
5. Among the below virtual machines choose the one which is used by the Android operating system Correct answer - A) Android uses Dalvik operating system.
6. Identify the language on which Android is based upon. Correct answer - C) Android is based upon Java.
7. All layout classes are the subclasses of Correct answer - C) all layout classes are the subclasses of android.view.ViewGroup in android.
8. The full form of APK is Correct answer - C) APK stands for Android package kit.
9. What is manifest XML in android? Correct answer - B) It has all the information about an application
10. What is the use of a content provider in Android? Correct answer - C) A content provider is used to share information between Android applications.
11. While developing android application developers can test their apps on Correct answer - D) Apps can be tested in all the sources mentioned above.
12. In android, mini activities are also known as Correct answer - C) In android, mini activities are also known as Fragments
13. Among the following choose the one which converts Java bytecode into Dalvik bytecode Correct answer - A) dex compiler converts convert JAVA bytecode into Dalvik bytecode.
14. The services in android can be stopped using which of the following method? Correct answer - B) stopSelf() and stopService() method can be used to stop services in android.
15. Activity in Android can be killed using? Correct answer - D) Activity in Android can be killed using both finishActivity (int requestCode) and finish() method.
